mapper.insert: insert into qa values(seq_qa_idx.nextVal, #{title}, #{emp_name}, #{dept_name}, #{content}, #{id}, #{pwd}, 0, sysdate, seq_qa_idx.currVal, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update qa set readhit = readhit + 1 where qa_idx = #{idx}
update qa set title=#{title}, emp_name=#{emp_name}, del_info = -1 where qa_idx = #{qa_idx}
update qa set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, regdate = sysdate where qa_idx=#{qa_idx}
mapper.select: select * from (select rank() over(order by ref desc, step asc) no, b.* from (select * from qa) b ) where no between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update qa set step = step + 1 where ref = #{ref} and step > #{step}
mapper.select: select * from qa where qa_idx= #{qa_idx} and pwd=#{pwd}
